package.name: Solaria
package.shortDescription: Enable Liquid Glass on unsupported Apple TV models running tvOS 26!

descriptionlist.description: Solaria is compatible with jailbroken (palera1n) Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (1st generation) units running tvOS 26
Solaria has been tested to work up to tvOS 26.1
Performance will be poor, as Apple disabled Liquid Glass support on these models for a reason.
